[[File:XC2 Challenge Battles.jpg|thumn|210px|right|Challenge Battles menu]] '''Challenge Battle Mode''' is a DLC game mechanic in {{XC2}} and {{XC3}}. It is similar to the [[Time Attack]] mode in {{XCDE}}. __TOC__ == {{XC2|-}} == Challenge Battle Mode is available starting in Chapter 4 after collecting the [[Nopon Summons]] from the [[Xenoblade Chronicles 2#Challenge Battle Mode Pack|Challenge Battle Mode Pack]] of the Expansion Pass. During [[New Game Plus (XC2)|New Game Plus]], it is available before Chapter 4 after collecting the Nopon Summons. Challenge battles are accessible from the [[Nopon Archsage]] in the [[Land of Challenge (XC2)|Land of Challenge]], which can be accessed via a portal in the [[Olethro Ruins (level)|Olethro Ruins]] after Chapter 3. If [[Jin]], [[Malos]], or [[Vandham (XC2)|Vandham]] is in the active party, the Nopon Archsage will not allow the player to select a Challenge Battle until the character is removed from the active party. {{clr}} === Challenge Battles === {| class="xc1 sortable centered col-1-left" width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" ! :※7 Available after completing the main story. == {{XC3|-}} == [[File:XC3 Challenge Battle Mode.png|thumb|210px|right|{{XC3|-}} Challenge Battle Mode]] Challenge Battle Mode is available after installing the second update of the [[Xenoblade Chronicles 3#Expansion Pass|Expansion Pass]] available on October 13, 2022. Time Attack Challenge Battles are accessible from the Nopon Archsage in the [[Land of Challenge (XC3)|Land of Challenge]], which is accessible via a portal at [[Llyn Nyddwr]] in [[Ribbi Flats]] after starting the [[Quest (XC3)|DLC quest]] ''[[Challenge Battles!]]''. The Archsage's Gauntlet becomes accessible after completing ''[[More Challenge Battles!]]''. Clearing all Challenge Battles with S Rank rewards the party with the [[Archsage's Flower Fan]], or the [[Humongous Nopon Doll]] in [[New Game + (XC3)|New Game +]]. During a Challenge Battle, [[Doom (XC3)|Doom]] will not function against enemies; additionally, if a Challenge Battle is played with the [[Difficulty Levels|difficulty]] set to Hard the [[Invincible (XC3)|Invincible]] buff will have no effect. There are two types of Challenge Battles: Time Attack and the [[Archsage's Gauntlet]]. {{clr}} === Time Attack === '''Time Attack''' has the party fight waves of enemies as fast as possible just like [[Time Attack]] in {{XCDE|-}}.
